command_toggle_checking.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when checking for updates.

command_toggle_loading.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when loading.

content_copied_entry.description: Overlay shown after copying an entry to the clipboard.
content_copied_entry.message: 項目をコピーしました

content_copied_fields.description: Overlay shown after copying entry as a tab-delimited fields to the clipboard.

content_copied_word.description: Overlay shown after copying a word to the clipboard.
content_copied_word.message: 単語をコピーしました

content_copy_error.description: Message shown in overlay when we couldn't copy to the clipboard
content_copy_error.message: コピーが失敗しました

content_copy_keys_entry_label.description: Label for key to copy a dictionary entry to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_fields_label.description: Label for key to copy a tab-separated set of fields to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_kanji_label.description: Label for key to copy a single kanji character to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_label.description: Label at start of row describing keys for copying information to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_next_label.description: Label for key to move the copy highlight to the next entry

content_copy_keys_word_label.description: Label for key to copy a word to the clipboard

content_copy_overlay_copy_title.description: Title shown at the top of the copy overlay when we can't find the word to copy.

content_copy_overlay_copy_title_with_wor.description: Title shown at the top of the copy overlay. It includes the matching headwords / kanji

content_copy_overlay_entry_button.description: Label for the button to copy an entire entry

content_copy_overlay_kanji_button.description: Fallback label used for the button to copy a kanji character when we fail to look up the kanji

content_copy_overlay_tab_separated_butto.description: Label for the button to copy an entry with fields separated by tabs

content_copy_overlay_word_button.description: Fallback label used for the button to copy a word when we fail to look up the word

content_database_updating.description: Status bar message shown while the dictionary is being updated and only a snapshot can be shown.

content_kanji_base_radical.description: The string used to describe the base radical

readings.example: しんにょう、しんにゅう

content_kanji_grade_name_use.description: Label for kanji marked as name use

content_kanji_meta_kokuji.description: Meta label for kokuji (kanji originated in Japan)

content_kanji_radical_label.description: The title given to the box showing radical information

content_kanji_strokes_label.description: The description of the number of strokes

content_kanji_strokes_label_1.description: The description of the number of strokes when there is exactly 1 stroke

content_mouse_onboarding_details_link.description: Link text to page with more details

options_browser_commands_no_toggle_key_e.message: このショートカットキーを変更する場合、 edge://extensions/shortcuts をアクセスし、設定変更を行ってください。

options_downloading_data.description: Label while we are downloading updates

options_edrdg_license.description: Description of license terms. The keywords 'Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group' and options_edrdg_license_keyword must appear so they can be linkified. IT SHOULD BEGIN WITH APPROPRIATE SPACE IN LANGUAGES THAT SEPARATE SENTENCES WITH WHITESPACE.
options_edrdg_license.message: このデータはElectronic Dictionary Research and Development Group (EDRDG)の所有権であり、EDRDGのライセンスに準拠して使用しております。

ref_label_jlpt.description: The label used when presenting the level the kanji appears in in the old JLPT system

ref_label_kk.description: The label used when presenting Kanji Kentei levels

ref_label_py.description: The label used when present the Pinyin reading
